apis.name: List project issue discussion items
apis.description: Gets a list of all discussion items for a single issue.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: issue_iid
attributes.description: The IID of an issue

apis.name: Get single issue discussion item
apis.description: Returns a single discussion item for a specific project issue

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: issue_iid
attributes.description: The IID of an issue

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a discussion item

apis.name: Create new issue thread
apis.description: Creates a new thread to a single project issue. This is similar to creating a note but other comments (replies) can be added to it later.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: issue_iid
attributes.description: The IID of an issue

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The content of the thread

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

apis.name: Add note to existing issue thread
apis.description: Adds a new note to the thread. This can also create a thread from a single comment.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: issue_iid
attributes.description: The IID of an issue

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread

attributes.name: note_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread note

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The content of the note/reply

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

apis.name: Modify existing issue thread note
apis.description: Modify existing thread note of an issue.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: issue_iid
attributes.description: The IID of an issue

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread

attributes.name: note_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread note

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The content of the note/reply

apis.name: Delete an issue thread note
apis.description: Deletes an existing thread note of an issue.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: issue_iid
attributes.description: The IID of an issue

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a discussion

attributes.name: note_id
attributes.description: The ID of a discussion note

apis.name: List project merge request discussion items
apis.description: Gets a list of all discussion items for a single merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The IID of a merge request

apis.name: Get single merge request discussion item
apis.description: Returns a single discussion item for a specific project merge request

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The IID of a merge request

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a discussion item

apis.name: Create new merge request thread
apis.description: Creates a new thread to a single project merge request. This is similar to creating a note but other comments (replies) can be added to it later.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The IID of a merge request

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The content of the thread

attributes.name: commit_id
attributes.description: SHA referencing commit to start this thread on

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position when creating a diff note

attributes.name: position[base_sha]
attributes.description: Base commit SHA in the source branch

attributes.name: position[start_sha]
attributes.description: SHA referencing commit in target branch

attributes.name: position[head_sha]
attributes.description: SHA referencing HEAD of this merge request

attributes.name: position[position_type]
attributes.description: Type of the position referenceâ€™, allowed values: text or image

attributes.name: position[new_path]
attributes.description: File path after change

attributes.name: position[new_line]
attributes.description: Line number after change (for text diff notes)

attributes.name: position[old_path]
attributes.description: File path before change

attributes.name: position[old_line]
attributes.description: Line number before change (for text diff notes)

attributes.name: position[line_range]
attributes.description: Line range for a multi-line diff note

attributes.name: position[width]
attributes.description: Width of the image (for image diff notes)

attributes.name: position[height]
attributes.description: Height of the image (for image diff notes)

attributes.name: position[x]
attributes.description: X coordinate (for image diff notes)

attributes.name: position[y]
attributes.description: Y coordinate (for image diff notes)

apis.name: Resolve a merge request thread
apis.description: Resolve or unresolve a thread of discussion in a merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The IID of a merge request

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread

attributes.name: resolved
attributes.description: Resolve/unresolve the discussion

apis.name: Add note to existing merge request thread
apis.description: Adds a new note to the thread. This can also create a thread from a single comment.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The IID of a merge request

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread

attributes.name: note_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread note

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The content of the note/reply

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

apis.name: Modify an existing merge request thread note
apis.description: Modify or resolve an existing thread note of a merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The IID of a merge request

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread

attributes.name: note_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread note

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The content of the note/reply (exactly one of body or resolved must be set

attributes.name: resolved
attributes.description: Resolve/unresolve the note (exactly one of body or resolved must be set

apis.name: Delete a merge request thread note
apis.description: Deletes an existing thread note of a merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The IID of a merge request

attributes.name: discussion_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread

attributes.name: note_id
attributes.description: The ID of a thread note

apis.name: Create new commit thread
apis.description: Creates a new thread to a single project commit. This is similar to creating a note but other comments (replies) can be added to it later.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

attributes.name: commit_id
attributes.description: The SHA of a commit

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The content of the thread

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position when creating a diff note

attributes.name: position[base_sha]
attributes.description: SHA of the parent commit

attributes.name: position[start_sha]
attributes.description: SHA of the parent commit

attributes.name: position[head_sha]
attributes.description: The SHA of this commit (same as commit_id)

attributes.name: position[position_type]
attributes.description: Type of the position referenceâ€™, allowed values: text or image

attributes.name: position[new_path]
attributes.description: File path after change

attributes.name: position[new_line]
attributes.description: Line number after change

attributes.name: position[old_path]
attributes.description: File path before change

attributes.name: position[old_line]
attributes.description: Line number before change

attributes.name: position[width]
attributes.description: Width of the image (for image diff notes)

attributes.name: position[height]
attributes.description: Height of the image (for image diff notes)

attributes.name: position[x]
attributes.description: X coordinate (for image diff notes)

attributes.name: position[y]
attributes.description: Y coordinate (for image diff notes)

apis.description: Adds a new note to the thread.

attributes.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)
